gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 102, Hornets 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets won their fourth straight game as they defeated the Hornets, 102-95. Michael Porter Jr. led the Nuggets with 22 points as Jamal Murray (20 points, 12 rebounds, five assists) and Nikola Jokic (18 points, 10 rebounds, nine assists) totaled 38 points. Miles Bridges (22 points, eight rebounds) and P.J. Washington (20 points, eight rebounds) led the Hornets as Nick Smith Jr. totaled 19 points (5-7 3PT). The Nuggets improve to 21-10 as the Hornets move to 7-20.
